segments.text: So I'm on the fifth floor ? How come this hotel has no fourth floor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Four is an unlucky number here , Peter.Four sounds like death in Chinese.Hotels often have no fourth floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see.Oh , I know what I wanted to ask.How much should I tip this guy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: People don't usually tip here , but you can.Fifty dollars should be more enough .
segments.speaker: S2
